余念もなく: (よねんもなく) - earnestly; intently; attentively; wholeheartedly
余念も無く: (よねんもなく) - earnestly; intently; attentively; wholeheartedly
余念無く: (よねんなく) - earnestly; intently; attentively; wholeheartedly
余情: (よじょう) - suggestiveness (of a poem); lingering charm; lasting impression
余慶: (よけい) - (ant: 余殃) fortunate heredity; blessings; the rewards of virtue; something bequeathed to posterity
余所: (よそ) - another place/somewhere else/strange parts; (ant: 内・うち・4) outside (one's family or group)/those people; (often as 〜を余所に,〜を余所にして, etc.) unrelated matter
余所ながら: (よそながら) - while at a distance; indirectly; casually
余所にする: (よそにする) - to neglect; to slight; to be indifferent to
余所乍ら: (よそながら) - while at a distance; indirectly; casually
余所余所しい: (よそよそしい) - distant; cold; formal
余所行き: (よそいき) - going out; one's best (clothes, looks, manners, behaviour, etc.); formal behaviour (manners, speech, etc.)
余暇: (yoka) - lazer, tempo de lazer, tempo livre
余業なく: (よぎょうなく) - unavoidably; necessarily; inevitably
余業無く: (よぎょうなく) - unavoidably; necessarily; inevitably
余殃: (よおう) - (ant: 余慶) trouble brought on by sins of forebears
余沢: (よたく) - blessings; benefits (of modern civilization, civilisation)
余波: (なごろ) - waves that remain after the wind has subsided; (よは only) after-effect/aftermath
余瀝: (よれき) - lingering raindrops; remaining portion of a drink; favors; favours
余烈: (よれつ) - ancestor's meritorious deeds; the evil effects of the lives of our predecessors
余燼: (よじん) - smouldering fire; smoldering fire; embers
余生: (よせい) - one's remaining years; the rest of one's life
余白注: (よはくちゅう) - marginal notes; glosses
余程: (よほど) - (余 is ateji) very/greatly/much/to a large extent/quite; just about to
余罪: (よざい) - other crimes; further offenses; further offences
余臭: (よしゅう) - lingering odor; lingering odour
余色: (よしょく) - complementary color; complementary colour
余芳: (よほう) - lingering fragrance; continuing fame (after death)
余蘖: (よげつ) - (esp. 余蘖)  sprouts from a stump; (esp. 余孽) ruined family surviving through a descendant
余裕: (yoyuu) - excedente, margem, folga, espaço, tempo, tolerância, flexibilidade, alcance; compostura, placidez, complacência, calma
余裕しゃくしゃく: (よゆうしゃくしゃく) - (yoji) calm and composed; broadminded; having enough and to spare
余裕をかます: (よゆうをかます) - to feign composure; to act like one has (time, money, strength, etc.) to spare
余裕を与える: (よゆうをあたえる) - to give someone space; to give someone breathing room; to cut someone some slack; to provide leeway; to provide an opportunity
余裕を咬ます: (よゆうをかます) - to feign composure; to act like one has (time, money, strength, etc.) to spare
余裕を噛ます: (よゆうをかます) - to feign composure; to act like one has (time, money, strength, etc.) to spare
余裕綽々: (よゆうしゃくしゃく) - (yoji) calm and composed; broadminded; having enough and to spare
余裕綽綽: (よゆうしゃくしゃく) - (yoji) calm and composed; broadminded; having enough and to spare
余計: (yokei) - demasiado, demasiada, excessivo, supérfluo, superabundante, extra, de sobra, excedente; desnecessário, inútil, sem necessidade, ocioso; demais, exageradamente, supérfluo, excessivamente, desnecessariamente, ainda mais
余計なお世話: (よけいなおせわ) - it's none of your business; it's not your concern
余計な世話を焼く: (よけいなせわをやく) - to poke one's nose (in) where one is not wanted
余計な御世話: (よけいなおせわ) - Mind your own business
余計者: (よけいもの) - person whose presence is unwelcome, unnecessary or a nuisance; fifth wheel; third wheel; interloper
余論: (よろん) - {law} ober dictum; passing remark in a judgement
余財: (よざい) - spare cash; available funds; remaining fortune
余集合: (よしゅうごう) - complementary set; complement
余韻: (yoin) - reverberation, swelling (of a hymn), trailing note; lingering memory, aftertaste , reverberation, swelling (of a hymn), trailing note; lingering memory, aftertaste; suggestiveness (de um livro, poema, etc.)
余韻嫋々: (よいんじょうじょう) - (yoji) (sound) lingering in the air; trailing notes (of a bell, etc.)
余韻嫋嫋: (よいんじょうじょう) - (yoji) (sound) lingering in the air; trailing notes (of a bell, etc.)
余類: (よるい) - remnants of a party or a gang
佚する: (いっする) - to lose (a chance)/to miss (a chance); to overlook/to omit/to forget; to deviate
佛像: (ぶつぞう) - statue of Buddha; image of Buddha; Buddhist statue; Buddhist image
佛種: (ぶっしゅ) - seed of Buddhahood; something that makes it possible to attain Buddhahood; teaching of Buddha which make it possible to be enlightened
作: (saku/sa/tsuku) - make , work (e.g. of art), production; harvest, cultivation, farming, crop, yield; technique
作が悪い: (さくがわるい) - have a poor crop
作する: (さくする) - to make; to produce; to manufacture
作り: (tsukuri) - making, producing, manufacturing, building, construction, make, structure; appearance (roupas, maquiagem, etc.) , making, producing, manufacturing, building, construction, make, structure; appearance (attire, make-up, etc.); build, physique; sashimi
